titulo: Supporting sustainable and smart urban mobility in Europe (CIVITAS)
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following outcomes:Valorisation, cross-fertilisation and dissemination of innovative solutions for sustainable urban mobility, from EU and national projects through the CIVITAS initiative;Contribution to the accelerated deployment of innovative urban mobility solutions, increasing competitiveness of European urban mobility actors while achieving European mobility policy objectives.Cities are equipped with a relevant knowle
